1.summary: The complexity of the Proto-Trex architecture may hinder widespread adoption in resource-limited settings.
1.verbatim: The complexity of the Proto-Trex architecture might pose challenges for widespread adoption, especially in resource-constrained environments.

2.summary: The evaluation of user interactions and their impact on model performance needs more comprehensive studies with diverse participants.
2.verbatim: While promising, the evaluation of user interactions and their impact on model performance and interpretability could benefit from further in-depth studies involving a broader range of participants.
